definition: can/to be possible/to be able to/will/to be likely to/to be sure to/to assemble/to meet/to gather/to see/union/group/association/CL:個|个[ge4]/a moment (Taiwan pr. for this sense is [hui3])
overcast (weather)/cloudy/shady/Yin (the negative principle of Yin and Yang)/negative (electric.)/feminine/moon/implicit/hidden/genitalia

sentences.english: Chronic pain stimulus of lumbar and perineum regions would cause sexual disorder.
sentences.chinese: 腰部及会阴区的慢性疼痛刺激可导致性功能障碍。

sentences.english: The uterus contracted well with bleeding of 200ml, lst degree perineal was repaired.
sentences.chinese: 子宫收缩好，出血200毫升，会阴一度撕裂被修复。

sentences.english: To observe the clinic effects of preventive application of antibiotic in incision of perineum in postpartum.
sentences.chinese: 目的观察产后会阴切口预防性应用抗生素的临床效果。

sentences.english: Moola bandha is also excellent for treating prolapse, leucorrhoea and urinary (stress) incontinence.
sentences.chinese: 会阴收束对治疗下垂，白带及尿失禁同样成效显著。

sentences.english: Thus the nursing of perineum is one of the important contents of preventing leukemia infection.
sentences.chinese: 故会阴的护理是预防白血病感染的重要内容之一。

sentences.english: Objective To report the diagnosis and treatment of 11 cases with perineal endometriosis PE .
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨会阴子宫内膜异位症的诊断和处理。

sentences.english: The perineum is also elastic but less so than the vagina.
sentences.chinese: 会阴也有弹性但是弹性力不如子宫。

sentences.english: Moola bandha has also proved to be useful in childbirth.
sentences.chinese: 会阴收束被证实对分娩同样有帮助。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the better method of protecting perineum in delivery.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨助产中更好地保护会阴的操作手法。

sentences.english: Conclusion There was a good effect on nursing of lateral episiotomy by using Amikacin solution.
sentences.chinese: 结论使用阿米卡星溶液护理会阴侧切口效果好。

sentences.english: Objective:To compare the effect of two different ways of suturing for puerpera accepting lateral episiotomy.
sentences.chinese: 比较会阴侧切两种缝合方法的效果。

sentences.english: Objective To report the experiences of diagnosis and treatment of perineal pain syndrome.
sentences.chinese: 目的报道会阴痛综合征的诊断与治疗经验。

sentences.english: Objective To explore the feasibility of surgical treatment of rectocele at the perineal path.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究经会阴入路手术治疗直肠前突的可行性。

sentences.english: In the beginning moola bandha should be practiced with antar kumbhaka (internal breath retention).
sentences.chinese: 开始时，会阴收束要结合内屏息一起练习。

sentences.english: Simultaneously the region of the perineum is contracted and pulled up towards the diaphragm.
sentences.chinese: 会阴区域收缩的同时向横隔膜方向提拉。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the clinical effect on the different perineum incision ways and saturation techniques.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨不同会阴切开方式及缝合技术的临床效果。

definition: sacrum (anatomy)/bone forming the base of the spinal column
popliteal (anatomy)/hollow at the back of the knee
